Wellness Habit Tracker Python Script

- Single-file Python 3 script using only standard libraries.
- Enables users to create, view, and track daily wellness habits such as hydration, meditation, sleep, exercise, or nutrition.
- Core features:
  - Add new habits with customizable names and daily target goals.
  - Log daily progress for each habit with date-based entries.
  - View current streaks, longest streaks, and completion percentages per habit.
  - Display a simple text calendar overview highlighting days when habits were completed.
- Persistent storage of all data in a local JSON file to maintain offline functionality.
- Command-line menu interface supporting keyboard navigation and clear prompts.
- Export/import functionality for backup and restore of all habit data in JSON format.
- Print-friendly summary view of habits and progress for any selected date range.
- Input validation and error handling to ensure robust user experience.
- Designed to be concise and maintainable, keeping implementation under ~500 lines.

(Generated: 2025-12-05T17:33:41.425961Z, seed=16495, theme=health & wellness, extras=print-friendly view, export/import JSON, offline-first with localStorage, kind=py)
